square[source]

square(x)

Returns the square of $x$, or $x^2$

{% endraw %}

Here is a demo of it.

{% raw %} 
square(12)

144
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for i in range(6):
    print(square(i))

0
1
4
9
16
25
{% endraw %}
